Text:
Hi Bioly_1,
thanks for the upload. However, quite a number of people have already downloaded your other two "Methods" torrents. Could you make a smaller torrent with just the missing books? I would really appreciate it!
Yeah, but many of us haven't.  I'd personally just settle for a few seeders.  An awful lot of people are stuck at 71.6%....

Hi Bioly,

Can you please reseed this 300 Mb torrent. Every body seems to be stucked here around 71.7%. You will do us a great service. Thanks...

bilogic
